####
PyCS
####

This package provides basic data structures and algorithms.

***************
Data structures
***************
- Linked lists

  - Single and double linked
- Trees

  - Binary search tree

- Stack
- Queue

***************
Algorithms
***************

- Search algorithms

  - Quicksort
  - Mergesort
  - Bubblesort
  - Timsort


*********
Structure
*********

- pycs
  
  - setup.py
  - README.rst
  - 
  - pycs
    
    - datastructures

    - algorithms

  - tests
